document.full_text: derrick rose had 39 points and five assists and luol deng added 15 to help the chicago bulls hold off the orlando magic 102-99 on sunday.
document.title: bulls fight off magic's charge, win seventh consecutive game
lines_and_colors: derrick rose had 39 points and five assists and luol deng added 15 to help the chicago bulls hold off the orlando magic 102-99 on sunday.
